key.name: ask-default
key.description: Whether or not Ephemeral should ask to be the default web browser (if it isn't already)

key.name: close-when-opening-externally
key.description: Whether or not the current Ephemeral window should be closed when opening a link in an external browser

key.name: dark-style
key.description: Whether or not Ephemeral should ask sites to render in a dark style where supported

key.name: enable-javascript
key.description: Whether or not JavaScript executes within pages

key.name: favorite-websites
key.description: List of favorite websites added by the user, i.e. to be used in autocomplete suggestions. Should contain bare hosts (i.e. subdomain.example.com) to be more easily completable by the user.

key.name: last-native-response
key.description: The last time (Unix timestamp in UTC) the user responded to the notice about running Ephemeral somewhere other than elementary OS

key.name: last-paid-response
key.description: The last time (Unix timestamp in UTC) the user responded to the notice about Ephemeral being a paid app

key.name: last-used-browser
key.description: The id of the last-used browser (the browser selected in the menu)

key.name: manual-closes-after-opening-externally
key.description: Number of times the user manually closed Ephemeral shortly after opening a page externally

key.name: search-engine
key.description: A search string using "%s" as a placeholder for a query

key.name: suggest-close-when-opening-externally
key.description: Whether or not Ephemeral should suggest to turn on the "Close when opening externally" setting if the user is manually doing it a lot

key.name: warn-network
key.description: Whether or not Ephemeral should warn when there is no network available connection

key.name: zoom
key.description: The last-used zoom level for web pages
